name: Don't Touch Me, I'm On Fire
name_original: Don't Touch Me, I'm On Fire
description:
Summary

Help Match find his way home. However, be mindful of his flammable body and the seemingly random placement of wooden objects throughout the world.

This game is a submission for the 3rd Blackthornprod Game Jam.

Controls

Keyboard and Xbox Controller support.

  • Left/Right Arrows | Left/Right D-Pad - Move Left/Right
  • Space | A Button - Jump
  • ESC | Start Button - Pause
Self-Promotion

You can watch the devlog for this project here.

Follow me on Twitter here.

Accolades

I want to thank my wife, for patiently listening to my mad game dev ramblings. My friends who playtested the game and provided feedback. Also, music was acquired at freemusicarchive.com and the author of the piece is sawsquarenoise.
